titleStmt.title: The new method of fortification, as practised by Monsieur de Vauban, Engineer General of France with an explication of all terms appertaining to that art / made English.
titleStmt.author: Vauban, Sébastien Le Prestre de, 1633-1707.
Swall, Abel.

notesStmt.note: Translated by A. Swall. Cf. BM.
"A new treatise of geometry": 79 p. at beginning.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
